name: In Attendance
description:
To everyone: The HTML5 version isn't working at the moment due to some kind of technical issue that appears to affect all web apps built with flutter. There's an Android version available if you're willing to support me with a $1 contribution! The app consists of a short audio story (length about 3 minutes) and a small set of animations which you can control with buttons (and which blend together nicely) that dictates the "action" 😉 going on in the background. Alternatively, you can download it for free by becoming a Patreon supporter:

Become a Patron!

To the support team: the app that's currently uploaded is a web build of the example flutter project you get when you create a new project. But even that doesn't work.
